subject: Re: [junit] ExpectedException: expecting a cause's message
msgSnippet: I think the ideal solution would be expectedException.expectCause(hasMessage(...)); expectCause already exists.  hasMessage also exists, but it s currently in
messageBody:
I think the ideal solution would be

expectedException.expectCause(hasMessage(...));

expectCause already exists. hasMessage also exists, but it's currently in
an internal package. You could submit a patch to bring it into a public
package; it might be an even better long-term solution to contribute it to
hamcrest, so the matcher can be used in other places.

David Saff
